CAREER SUMMARY  
 
2013 to date Cannon Europe  
 
2020  to date  
Position: Sales Manager DACH – Imaging Solution Business  
Canon Imaging Solution Business is a division within Canon Europe that comprises 
B2B optical products, software and services that are integrated into buildings and 
vehicles for industrial and commercial applications or critical infrastructures (defence).  
• Sales Management of Pro AV Channel in Germany, Austria, and Switzerland 
(AV Distributors, VARs, System Integrators; circa 250 stakeholders)  
• Business Development for new ISB solutions (video analytics, automation, 
etc.)  
• Technical Building Equipment: Close collaboration with Canon group 
companies Axis Communications (security) and 2N Networks (access control) 
to draft joint approach to planne rs, consultants, and engineering offices  
 
2017 to 2 020 
Position:  Territory & Key Account Manager  
Maximize sales of high -quality audio -visual solutions and related managed services to 
Swiss customers.  
• Management of Swiss Pro AV Advanced Partner Channel, including 
prospec ting, establishing new partners, setting objectives, training of sales 
    
and technical staff, as well as organising events with partner management 
and marketing  
• Acquisition of new business at Canon Major & Enterprise Accounts in close 
collaboration with C anon Direct Sales teams (usually indirect fulfilment by AV 
partner)  
• Keynote & presentations at conferences and events to C -level audience of 
partners and their customers  
 
2013 to 2017  
Positi on: Sales Mana ger – Partner Channe l 
Managing a team of KAMs and BDMs to expand market share in Swiss partner 
channels of IT & Office (84 partners), Network Visual Solutions (CCTV; 15 partners) 
and Pro AV (25 partners) in close collaboration with product & channel marketing, 
technical sales, distribution and service organisation.  
• Develo p, modify, and execute channel strategies  
• Implement account management standards (Solution Selling/Value Added 
Partnership)  
• Present Canon products and solutions at multiple events and roadshows  
 
2010 to 2012 Dell Switzerland  
Position: Channel Account Manager  
Sales of B2B hardware and software sol utions through channel partners (VARs, data 
centers, system integrators) and later start of distribution.  
• Recruitment, development, and management of key business partners  
• Direct sales to data centres  
• Collaboration with Dell Global 500, Large Enterprise, Public and SMB teams  
• Coaching and onboarding of new team colleague s  
• Highest revenue and margin contribution in Swiss channel team in multiple 
quarters  
 
2207 to 2010 Steuerberatungskanzlei Jens Pfeiffer  
Position : Business Consultant (Freelance)  
Business plans for clients to obtain bank loans or funding from European Social Fund. 
Work on s pecial tax and M&A customer cases.  
 
COMMENT  
 
 
Ambitious business administration generalist with exceptional technical understanding. 
Strong background in Sales and Business Development in Fortune 500 companies, 
exceeding revenue and profit goals, overseeing customer service,  managing and 
developing staff and implementing efficient and effective business practices and 
processes. Fluent in German, English and French.  
 
Professional Skills  
• Leadership  
• Communication  
• Finance  
• Sales  
• Business Development  
• Organizational  
• Customer Service  
• Analytical  
• Technology  
    
 
 
For further information please contact Julie Smith or Jan Johnston on

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
